citations.narrative:
In the nonhuman primate kitchen, a bottle of Virex II cleaner was not appropriately stored. Substances that are toxic to the
nonhuman primates but that are required for normal husbandry practices must not be stored in food storage and
preparation areas. Cleaning chemicals could contaminate food or food contact surfaces, and should not be on the
counter.
Corrected at the time of inspection.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “B” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspection(s) or by 14 September 2025 or the applicant will forfeit the
license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License
Inspection.
Regulated activity can not continue under your existing USDA license as it has already expired.
n

narrative:
3.75(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
In the nonhuman primate kitchen, a bottle of Virex II cleaner was not appropriately stored. Substances that are toxic to the 
nonhuman primates but that are required for normal husbandry practices must not be stored in food storage and 
preparation areas. Cleaning chemicals could contaminate food or food contact surfaces, and should not be on the 
counter. 
 
Corrected at the time of inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “B” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspection(s) or by 14 September 2025 or the applicant will forfeit the 
license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License 
Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can not continue under your existing USDA license as it has already expired. 
 
 n
